languages.text: Изучаемая планета совершенно безжизненна, на ней не удалось обнаружить даже примитивные формы жизни. Однако команда сделала странную находку — в центре огромного кратера на поверхности лежит... большое зеркало. На вид — совершенно обычное зеркало в раме. Неповрежденное.

traits.locale_text: Изучаемая планета совершенно безжизненна, на ней не удалось обнаружить даже примитивные формы жизни. Однако команда сделала странную находку — в центре огромного кратера на поверхности лежит… большое зеркало. На вид — совершенно обычное зеркало в раме. Неповрежденное.

languages.text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.
languages.original_text: Изучаемая планета совершенно безжизненна, на ней не удалось обнаружить даже примитивные формы жизни. Однако команда сделала странную находку — в центре огромного кратера на поверхности лежит... большое зеркало. На вид — совершенно обычное зеркало в раме. Неповрежденное.

traits.locale_text: This planet is devoid of even the tiniest and most primitive life forms. However, the crew has discovered a mirror right in the center of a large crater. It looks like a regular mirror in a frame. It is pristine.

This planet is devoid of even the tiniest and most primitive life forms. However, the crew has discovered a mirror right in the center of a large crater. It looks like a regular mirror in a frame. It is pristine.

This planet is devoid of even the tiniest and most primitive life forms. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — right in the centre of a large crater lies a mirror. It looks like a completely regular mirror in a frame. Pristine.

This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

languages.text: 这颗行星上甚至连最原始的生命形态都没有。不过，船员们发现了非常古怪的东西——一面镜子摆在巨大火山口的中心。从外观上来看，这面镜子看起来没有任何异状，完好无损。
languages.original_text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星上甚至连最原始的生命形态都没有。不过，船员们发现了非常古怪的东西——一面镜子摆在巨大火山口的中心。从外观上来看，这面镜子看起来没有任何异状，完好无损。

languages.text: Este planeta está desprovisto incluso de las formas de vida más primitivas. Sin embargo, la tripulación ha hecho un descubrimiento intrigante: un espejo justo en el centro de un enorme cráter. A primera vista, es un espejo con marco completamente corriente. En perfectas condiciones.
languages.original_text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

traits.locale_text: Este planeta está desprovisto incluso de las formas de vida más primitivas. Sin embargo, la tripulación ha hecho un descubrimiento intrigante: un espejo justo en el centro de un enorme cráter. A primera vista, es un espejo con marco completamente corriente. En perfectas condiciones.

languages.text: この惑星には、最も原始的な生命体すら存在しない。しかし、クルーは奇妙なものを発見した。巨大なクレーターの中心に鏡が転がっているのだ。縁の付いた、どう見ても普通の鏡だ。状態もきれいである。
languages.original_text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

traits.locale_text: この惑星には、最も原始的な生命体すら存在しない。しかし、クルーは奇妙なものを発見した。巨大なクレーターの中心に鏡が転がっているのだ。縁の付いた、どう見ても普通の鏡だ。状態もきれいである。

languages.text: Auf diesem Planeten gibt es nicht einmal die primitivsten Lebensformen. Aber die Crew hat eine sonderbare Entdeckung gemacht — einen Spiegel, der mitten im Zentrum eines riesigen Kraters liegt. Einen völlig gewöhnlichen Spiegel in einem Rahmen, wie es scheint. In makellosem Zustand.
languages.original_text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

traits.locale_text: Auf diesem Planeten gibt es nicht einmal die primitivsten Lebensformen. Aber die Crew hat eine sonderbare Entdeckung gemacht — einen Spiegel, der mitten im Zentrum eines riesigen Kraters liegt. Einen völlig gewöhnlichen Spiegel in einem Rahmen, wie es scheint. In makellosem Zustand.

languages.text: Cette planète n'abrite aucune forme de vie, pas même les plus primitives. Cependant, l'équipage a fait une étrange découverte : un miroir, qui se trouve au centre d'un énorme cratère. Ce miroir encadré est d'apparence tout à fait ordinaire. En excellent état.
languages.original_text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.

traits.locale_text: Cette planète n'abrite aucune forme de vie, pas même les plus primitives. Cependant, l'équipage a fait une étrange découverte : un miroir, qui se trouve au centre d'un énorme cratère. Ce miroir encadré est d'apparence tout à fait ordinaire. En excellent état.

languages.text: Bu gezegen, en ilkel yaşam formlarından bile yoksun. Bununla birlikte mürettebat, oldukça tuhaf bir keşifte bulunuyor: devasa bir kraterin tam ortasında duran bir ayna. Çerçevesi de olan, tamamen sıradan bir aynaya benziyor. Sanki hiç el değmemiş.
languages.original_text: This planet is devoid of even the most primitive forms of life. However, the crew has made quite a strange discovery — a mirror, lying right in the centre of a huge crater. A completely ordinary mirror in a frame, by all appearances. In pristine condition.
